name: Bitter Blade
description: You focus your bitter feelings toward the world of the living into a slashing attack. Make a melee attack, doing 2d6 + MOVE fire damage on a hit. Half of the damage dealt is restored to the user.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
